name: Heroku Dyno Switcher
description: A little script to switch dynos between apps and accounts

FIRST_PROCESSTYPE.description: The process type of your app, you can use web, worker or something else. Check it in the Resources tab of your heroku app.

FIRST_A_APPNAME.description: The app name of your primary app.

FIRST_A_APIKEY.description: The API key of the heroku account your primary app is in. Check it in your heroku settings, in the last of the page.

FIRST_B_APPNAME.description: The app name of your secondary app.

FIRST_B_APIKEY.description: The API key of the heroku account your secondary app is in. Check it in your heroku settings, in the last of the page.
